data.title: Weather today
data.meta_description: Kalka, India - Current temperature and weather conditions. Detailed hourly weather forecast for today - including weather conditions, temperature, pressure, humidity, precipitation, dewpoint, wind, visibility, and UV index data.
data.text:
Weather forecast and temperature for today - Tuesday, 27. Aug

5:55 am

6:51 pm

IST

Thunderstorms

31°C / 24°C

Wind: 11km/h SE

Humidity: 82%

Precip. probability: 73%

Precipitation: 6mm

UV index: 7

On Tuesday, in Kalka, rainy weather and storms with thunder and lightning are anticipated.

With a high probability, light precipitation is forecasted for today. Predicted temperature values will span from a hot 31°C (87.8°F) down to a warm 24°C (75.2°F).

The maximum heat index, which represents the influence of relative humidity on air temperature, is computed to be an extremely hot 42°C (107.6°F). Take into consideration that the heat index values are calculated for shade and light wind conditions. Bear in mind that direct sunshine exposure increases weather impact and may raise the heat index by up to 15 Fahrenheit (8 Celsius) degrees.

The day's highest temperature will align with the regular August high of 32.6°C (90.7°F).

Sunrise was at 5:55 am and sunset will be at 6:51 pm; the daylight will last for 12h and 56min.

Frequently asked questions

What is the temperature now?

Currently (6:18 am) it is 24°C (75.2°F) in Kalka.

What is the weather forecast for Kalka for today?

On Tuesday, in Kalka, thunderstorms and rainy weather are anticipated.

Will it rain today?

Light precipitation of 6mm (0.24") is expected. The likelihood of rainfall is 73%.

What will be the maximum temperature today?

Today, the highest temperature will be 31°C (87.8°F), while the lowest temperature will be 24°C (75.2°F). The maximum heat index, which represents the influence of relative humidity on air temperature, is appraised at 42°C (107.6°F).

The maximum temperature will be in line with the average highest temperature of 32.6°C (90.7°F) in August. The lowest temperature will be also in line with the average low of 24.3°C (75.7°F).

When is the sunrise / sunset today?

On Tuesday, in Kalka, sunrise was at 5:55 am and sunset will be at 6:51 pm (IST).

How long is the day today?

In Kalka, today, there will be 12h and 56min of daylight.
